General.Name: Kids Brands House N.V
General.Description: Kids Brands House N.V., formerly known as Nanoventure N.V., is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in start-up, early venture, mid venture, PIPES, growth capital, and turnaround investments in medium-sized companies. The firm makes direct equity investments but will also consider silent partnerships and shareholder loans. Kids Brands House N.V invests in companies within the textile business focusing on companies across fashion in Germany and neighboring countries. The firm seeks to invest out of balance sheet and takes majority and minority stake in the portfolio companies. Kids Brands House N.V. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Waalre, The Netherlands.
